## Template type

Abstract base class for the data of Templates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Template = VersionedItem & {
    BinaryContent?: BinaryContent;
    Content?: string;
    ParameterSchema?: Link;
    TemplateType?: string;
};
```
